name: Master Thief
senses: blindsight 20 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 17

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage. The target makes a DC 19 Constitution saving throw  taking 17 (5d6) poison damage on a failure  or half as much damage on a success.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage. The target makes a DC 19 Constitution saving throw  taking 17 (5d6) poison damage on a failure  or half as much damage on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Cunning Action
bonus_actions.desc: The assassin takes the Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Object action.

bonus_actions.name: Rapid Attack
bonus_actions.desc: The assassin attacks with their shortsword.

special_abilities.name: Crossbow Expert
special_abilities.desc: The master assassin ignores the loading quality of light crossbows, and being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesnt impose disadvantage on the master assassins ranged attack rolls.

special_abilities.name: Deadly Poison
special_abilities.desc: As part of making an attack, the master thief can apply a deadly poison to their weapons (included below). The master thief carries 3 doses of this poison. A single dose can coat two melee weapons or up to 10 pieces of ammunition. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by their poison damage is stable but unconscious for 1 hour

special_abilities.name: Evasion
special_abilities.desc: When the master assassin makes a Dexterity saving throw against an effect that deals half damage on a success, they take no damage on a success and half damage on a failure.

special_abilities.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
special_abilities.desc: The master assassin deals an extra 28 (8d6) damage when they hit with a weapon attack while they have advantage on the attack, or when the master assassins target is within 5 feet of an ally of the master assassin while the master assassin doesnt have disadvantage on the attack.

special_abilities.name: Cunning Celerity
special_abilities.desc: The master thief takes two bonus actions on each of their turns.
